directions.step:
Wash asparagus, snap off stems at the point where they break easily (about 1/2 " from the end) & slice into 1/2" pieces.
Combine broth & vermouth & warm just to simmering in a saucepan or in the microwave on high for 2 minutes.
Heat 1 tsp. of olive oil in a large non stick skillet over medium heat. Saute onions & mushrooms for 2 minutes. Add rice & saute 1 minute. Add 1/2 cup broth mixture & stir. Adjust the heat so the broth is barely simmering. As liquid is absorbed, add more (about 1/2 c. at a time). Simmer 15 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes & adding more broth as needed.
Add asparagus & simmer 5 minutes. Test rice. It should be firm, but cooked through. Simmer a few more minutes if necessary.
Remove from heat & add parmesan cheese, remaining tsp. of olive oil and salt & pepper to taste. Sprinkle basil on top.
